1.content:
A boy of 10 years named Ryan was a foster child after his parents divorced and they are fighting over him in court. He is wise for his age and he did not like his parents fighting. Rather than waiting for them to stop fighting, he gathered his things from the foster home and left in the dead of night without telling anyone. He does not like fighting or arguing and peace was what he liked after going into a forest with a clear mind. He is very smart and a hard worker, but he cries in his sleep because his parents were stupid for fighting over him.

In the same forest as ryan was a fox who was watching him since he first entered the forest and she smiled at him.

"He is young, but determined to get the job done and wise for his age." she said looking at him
"I wonder why he cries at night during the rain."

She is able to change her size at will and have a human form as well, but she has not revealed her human form to anyone.

"He could use some place better than the forest and I can help him." she said as she decided to meet with the boy
1.title: A boy and the fox

11.content:
As the fox got close to the boy’s camp without making a sound, she got a better view of his campsite and his body. His body looked it has mini muscles and the sky look like it was going to rain again, but he was crying his sleep as he did the night before which would be the first night in the forest.

~He needs someone to care for him and love him.~ she thought as she looked at him
~My cave is better than this, but I will ask him when he wakes up.~

She walks away from the camp as the boy started to stir from his sleep and he saw her, but his vision was blurry from his tears.

“Stop.” He said as he wiped away the tears
“Hello little one.” She said to him kindly
“Why are you in my camp? Did they send you to find me?” he asked her
“What are you talking about?”

He explains why he was in the forest and she understands him to why he ran away from home.

“Who are you by the way?” she asked him
“I’m Ryan.” He said
“Renamon.”
“So you are the so called monster.”
“What do you mean?”
“I wanted to meet you after Ashley and Kain told me about you.”
“You met them?”
“Yes, before my parents started to file a divorce and fight over me.”
“Well you have a nice camp, but why don’t you come with me to my cave so don’t you won’t be alone here.” She said
“Eh, why not it is about time I move to a safer campsite.” He said as they got everything packed and ready to go
11.title: The meeting

111.content:
With everything packed and ready to go, he made sure that they won't be followed by their tracks and he was started to like renamon.

~Why is she here?~
~How did she know that I was here?~
~Will she try to bring me back to them?~

Ryan was thinking questions as he was doing his job, but something he noticed and he climbed up a tree. He noticed a small camera on the branch was aimed at his camp and he destroyed the camera by knifing the lens and throwing it into firepit.

"They knew I was here." he said before
"Or there were waiting for her." he said thinking about renamon

Renamon vanished from his camp, but small tremors were coming from something big.

"Where did she go?"
"Those feel like footsteps." he said as he looked up to a see a giant renamon looking at him with a smile before picking his stuff and him up in her paws
"The sooner we leave the better." she said as he nodded in agreement

She put him on her shoulder and started to head for her cave, but he was looking her body and he made sure that he was safe with her.
111.title: Going to her cave

1111.content:
When they got to her cave, he was thinking about kain and ashley the whole time so he didn’t hear what renamon was saying.

“Ryan?” she called his name
“Ryan.”
“Sorry renamon. I was thinking about ashley and kain.” he said after he broke from his trance
“So how did you meet them?”
“They were…my parents when I was born and they told me stories of you before they gave me to my currents parents.”
“You are their son?” she asked surprised
“Before they went into hiding from the rest of the world, I was their son and they told me of you.”

She put him and his things on a table before returning to her normal height and she hugs him like a mother would, but she was growing as she was doing it.

“Renamon.” He said as she was slowly reaching her giant height
“Yes?”
“You are growing on me.”
“I know, but I want to take care of you like a real mother.” She said as she reached her giant size and she is smiling
1111.title: finally there

11111.content:
She is hugging him to her chest, but he can breathe as she walked to a washbasin that looked like a pool to him and it has a built in waterfall for a sink.

“This is where you will be cleaned.” she said as he looked at the pool and she sat him down near the edge

She went to get some things for their bath and he thought about when ash told him about her first bath with renamon. He started to take his shirt to see his mini arm muscles and thought about kain teaching him how to fight when he was older.

“Are you ready for your bath?” she comes back and looks at him
“Yes, I am.” He said as she shrinks down to half her height and she took off the rest of his clothes before they jumped into the water

She washed his ember colored hair after wrapping herself around him so he would be safe with her and he started to wash his body on his own. Soon she was helping him washing his body and she has gotten to feel his muscles when she was drying him off with a towel soon after she rid his body of the soap.

~He is like his father, but question is that does he have the berserker power in his blood.~
11111.title: Bath time

111111.content:
He felt tired so he fell asleep in her arms right there and she went to put some nightclothes on him so he would not freeze or get sick.

“He must have been really tired, but he didn’t show it till know.” she said as she got him all nice and warm before returning to her giant size and getting onto her bed with him close to her

“Go night ryan and you might be surprised when you wake up.” she said before going to sleep

Ryan is dreaming about want his parents told him of renamon and he felt her going to sleep as well, but something entered his mouth and a strange liquid was filling up in his mouth so he started to drink it. That particular liquid is coming from renamon herself so she is feeding him with her milk and he is still very young in her mind.

~He is going to get very strong by drinking from me.~ she thought as he continued to drink

Soon ryan felt full and he stopped drinking, but that didn’t happen because milk was still flowing into his mouth. He kept drinking until it stopped and it did after some time, but something like the first thing that entered his mouth and he started drinking again.

~What is this that I’m drinking?~ He asked himself
~This can’t be her...- he had the thought in his head so he didn’t finished what he was thinking

He had the thought of when ash was feeding him after he was born and she had him drinking from her chest.

~Well, finding her is better than being caught by my other parents who are fighting over me.~ he thought as his body was still drinking till it stopped

After some time, the milk stopped flowing into his mouth and they were sleeping peacefully till they heard a loud sound coming from outside her which woke them up and she brought ryan to her shoulder.

“Ryan, let’s go see what made that sound.” She said as he nodded before she had gotten to her feet.

They went outside to find…
111111.title: Time for a nap

choices: Bent down and licked them playfully. (she's gentle)
Began to increase the pressure she put on them with her paws. (she's evil)
11111111.content:
Ryan and Renamon had just woken up and left their cave together when they were met by a rather large surprise. Waiting right outside of the cave was another colossal digimon. She was the same size as Renamon's giant form, but she resembled a white cat rather than a yellow fox. She had a sparkling golden ring around her tail, which had mysterious runes carved all around it. On her front paws, she wore a pair of yellow gloves with orange stripes and large black claws.

For those who can't imagine it, she basically looks like this: http://14-bis.deviantart.com/art/Tailmon...((gatomon)%20AND%20(by%3A14-bis))&qo=0

This giant cat digimon was staring down at the duo (Renamon was at human size right now) with a broad smile across her face. Before Renamon could grow to her full size again, the giant cat pinned her down underneath one of her massive front paws. She then did the same with Ryan. Renamon wasn't able to grow while she was restrained like this, so the duo could only wait in fear to see what this new digital giantess would do with them. Staring at them from above, the giant cat...
11111111.title: That is a BIG kitty!

choices: "It's fine with me. There's plenty of room, even if we're both in giant mode!"
"I'll let her stay, but only on one condition: She has to beat me in a fight!"
111111111.content:
Ryan and Renamon were pinned helplessly beneath the giant cat digimon's massive paws. They could only watch in horror and await whatever their captor would soon do to them. The giant cat bent down so that her massive face was only inches away from Renamon, and smiled cheerfully. She then extended her tongue and began to playfully lick Renamon's face. Renamon's fur was left a complete wreck. She then moved her head over to her other paw and did the same thing with Ryan.

After she had had her fun, the colossal cat released her captives. She then stood up on her hind legs and proceeded to shrink down to human size. When she had reached the same size as Renamon, she giggled cutely and spoke up.

"Hi there! My name's Gatomon! Nice to meetcha!"

She then reached out her paw to shake hands with Renamon. Both Ryan and Renamon were still shocked from all that had happened in such a short time, and simply stood there baffled. Gatomon just giggled again.

"Come on, don'tcha know what a handshake is?"

Ryan spoke up this time.

"Ummm... I don't think that that's the issue here, Miss Gatomon. You just showed up out of nowhere, pinned us down, licked us like we were gonna be your dinner, and now you're offering us a handshake?! I'm sorry, but do you mind explaining what part of that is normal at all?!"

Gatomon's smile faded.

"Aw, that was just a little game... I didn't mean anything by it... Are you angry at me?"

"Well... I suppose if you didn't mean any harm to us, then I think that we can forgive you... Right Renamon?"

Renamon reached out and grabbed Gatomon's paw to return her handshake. Smiling at her, she began to speak.

"Eh... I guess so... And besides, it's not like you did anything too serious..."

Renamon's cheerful smile then turned into a devious smirk. She flipped Gatomon over her shoulder and threw her to the ground in one fluid motion. Gatomon laid on the ground for a moment in a daze, and Ryan was just plain shocked at what just happened. Gatomon soon stood up, and rubbed her back to ease the pain.

"Ow... Jeez Renamon, what the heck was that for?"

"That was for completely ruining my fur! It takes forever to get it all straightened out... But now that I've gotten that out of my system, you're forgiven."

"Ugh... Well, thanks I guess... So, we're friends now, right?"

"Sure! I don't see any reason not to be!"

Then Ryan chimed in.

"So Gatomon, are you gonna be living with us in Renamon's cave now or something?"

"Could I really?!"

"Well, that's up to Renamon... It is her cave, after all... What do you think, Renamon?"


How will Renamon answer?
111111111.title: Another digital friend

1111111112.content: Before we begin the fight, I think it would be nice to have the option of choosing either possible result. Which of the digital girls will win?
1111111112.title: Deciding the victor before the fight even starts

choices: "I think that I'll stay in this form for a little while longer."
"Fine then, I guess I'll turn back to Gatomon now."
11111111122.content:
"I'll let Gatomon stay in my cave, but only on one condition. I don't want any weaklings staying with us, so she's going to have to prove her strength to me. If she can defeat me in a fight, then I'll let her stay."

"Really? Alright then, I'll beat you good!"

Renamon smirked at the anxious cat.

"Hold it, kid. I just need to set up some ground rules for this battle to make sure that it's fair. First of all, no growing; we'll be fighting at our original sizes, no bigger."

"Aw man... Fine..."

Gatomon then shrank down to more-or-less the same size as a normal cat. Ryan looked at her confused.

"Why did you shrink? I thought Renamon said to fight at your original size..."

"This is my original size..."

"Oh..."

Renamon snapped her fingers to get everyone's attention back on her.

"Anyways, rule number 2; we can use any of our non-growth abilities to win. Other than that, it's just going to be a no holds barred brawl."

"Ah, that I like! Well then, let's get started!"

Gatomon and Renamon then jumped away from each other. Staring each other in the eyes, the two digi-girls charged at each other.

"Lightning paw!" Gatomon cried out

Gatomon began to charge an electrical energy in her paw and swung an incredibly quick punch at Renamon. Renamon swiftly dodged backward and jumped into the air.

"Diamond storm!" Renamon yelled

At that point, she crossed her arms over her chest before swinging them outward. Numerous energy shards formed in front of her, and quickly launched themselves at Gatomon. Gatomon wasn't able to dodge in time, and the crystals hit her hard. She was sent crashing against a tree. Renamon simply laughed.

"Hahaha... Is that all you've got? You're too slow, kitty cat!"

Getting to her feet again, Gatomon grunted and brushed some dirt off of her knees.

"Ugh... You're pretty good... Looks like I'll need to take this up a notch!"

Just then, Gatomon enveloped herself in a cocoon of light.

"Gatomon digivolve to... Angewomon!"

Emerging from the cocoon of light was an entirely new digimon. Instead of being a cat, the digimon that emerged was a beautiful female angel with 8 shimmering white wings, a long pink ribbon encircling her body, and a silver helmet covering the top half of her face. She looked like this: http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2010/0...

This glorious angel known as Angewomon wasted no time getting back into the battle with Renamon.

"Celestial arrow!" Angewomon yelled.

With that, Angewomon jumped high into the air. the wings on her left glove turned into a bow, and an arrow of energy materialized within it. She took aim at Renamon in this position: http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs28/i/2008/0... and fired at her. Renamon wasn't fast enough to avoid the arrow of light, and it struck her right in the chest. The arrow pierce through her and she fell to the ground. The arrow of light then vanished from the unconscious Renamon's chest without even leaving a wound. Angewomon slowly floated back down to the ground.

Ryan looked up at her beautiful form in awe.

"Ummm... Miss Angewomon? Is Renamon going to be okay?"

Angewomon simply giggled. She then hoisted the unconscious fox over her shoulder and began to walk toward the cave. Looking back to Ryan, she spoke in a gentle feminine voice that was fitting of an angel.

"Don't worry, kid... She'll be fine. She just needs a bit of rest is all. I'm quite impressed that a rookie level digimon was able to best my champion form though. This girl has quite some talent for battling."

Angewomon carried Renamon into the cave, and Ryan followed close behind her. She located a bed and laid Renamon down on it. Minutes later, Renamon awoke. Looking over at Angewomon with a smirk, she accepted her defeat.

"Ugh... I suppose you win... You're free to stay here now..."

"Yay! Thank you Renamon!"

"No problem. I must say, I'm impressed! I've never been defeated in battle before..."

"I'm impressed with you as well. You're only a rookie level digimon, but you overpowered my champion level form with such ease. Not to mention how quickly you recovered! You have quite a bit of talent, Renamon!"

"Thanks, I do train quite hard... Well, my home is now your home, so make yourself at home!"

"That's great, Angewomon! You're free to stay! So, are you going to change back to Gatomon now?" Ryan said

A mischievous smirk spread across Angewomon's face.

"Why? Does this form make you feel nervous?"

Ryan begins to blush furiously.

"Well... Ummm... Maybe just a little bit..."

"Hahahaha! Oh Ryan, you are absolutely adorable! ____________."
11111111122.title: Digital girls duking it out!

choices: "Oh come on, Renamon! I'm not doing anything wrong, & I think that he likes it!"
"Alright then, Renamon... I'll leave Ryan alone... No need to be jealous..."
111111111221.content:
"I think that I'll stay in this form for a bit longer. I personally do enjoy it quite a bit, and since you like it so much..."

Angewomon then reached up to her head and removed her helmet, revealing her gorgeous young face with sparkling blue eyes: http://maviboncuk.deviantart.com/art/Ang... or http://bakabakka.blogspot.com/2013/12/ga...

"I think that I can have some fun like this..."

Ryan's face was blushing like crazy as he stared at Angewomon's beauty. She simply giggled and walked toward him.

"Come on Ryan, there's no need to be nervous around me. After all, we are going to be living together from now on."

"B-but Angewomon... I just... It's not that... I don't-"

Ryan's muttering was silenced as Angewomon gently placed her index finger over his lips.

"Shhhhh... Like I said, there's no need to be so nervous. Just sit back and enjoy-"

Just then, Renamon burst into the room. She wasn't at her full size, but she had grown to be twice the size of Angewomon.

"Angewomon! Stop trying to seduce Ryan!"

"Aw, I was just trying to have a little fun... There's no reason for you to get all up in arms about it..."

Angewomon then grew to the same size as Renamon. She looked at Renamon and smiled.

"Besides... You were the one who invited me to live with you in the first place!"

"Ugh... Fine... Just leave Ryan alone. Can't you tell that he isn't comfortable with this?"

"Eh, I think he's fine. He just needs to get used to having me around is all..."

"Angewomon... Please just stop bothering him..."


How will Angewomon respond?
111111111221.title: The beauty of an angel

choices: "What?! I can't decide between you two! I like you both!"
"Ummm... I think that I like ________ more!"
1111111112211.content:
"Oh come on, Renamon! I'm not doing anything wrong... I'm just having some fun with a boy who happens to be living in the same cave as me! Besides, I think that little Ryan here likes it!"

"I don't care! I'm the one who saw him first! Just leave him alone, or I'm going to have to hurt you!"

"Really Renamon? Have you already forgotten how quickly I beat you in this form? Do you really want to go another round with me?"

Ryan was getting fed up with the two digi-girls' argument. He immediately stepped in between the two, who were both a little more than twice his size, and began to try and stop them.

"Girls! Quit it! There's no need to fight like this! We're all friends here, aren't we?"

Renamon and Angewomon looked at each other for a moment before they both nodded and returned to normal size. Angewomon then grabbed Ryan by the arm.

"Alright Renamon, how about we let Ryan decide which of us he wants to be with!"

"And the other one will have to leave him alone without question?"

"Yep!"

"Okay then, angel. You're on! Tell me Ryan, which of us do you prefer?"
1111111112211.title: Letting Ryan choose who he wants to be with...

choices: Ryan and the digi-girls go into the woods to get some food.
A third digimon arives, this one wearing a mysterious device around its neck.
11111111122111.content:
In a fit of anger, Ryan pulls his arms out of the grips of the two digi-girls before taking a step backward. He then looked at them with a very serious expression on his face.

"What are you girls talking about?! I can't decide between the two of you! I like both of you!"

"But Ryan-" the girls said in unison before being quickly cut off by Ryan.

"No! No 'but's! This is just ridiculous! You two are supposed to be friends, but just look at yourselves! I want this stupid rivalry of yours to end RIGHT NOW!"

The two let out a sigh before conceding to defeat. Ryan had a point, and they couldn't argue against it.

"Alright Ryan, Angewomon and I will try to get along better..."

"Yeah... Actually, I'm getting a little tired... I think that I should turn back to Gatomon for now to recharge..."

There was then a flash of light as Angewomon reverted back to her earlier form. Being the size of a common cat again, she immediately used her powers to grow back to the same size as Renamon and Ryan. Ryan looked at her confused.

"Why didn't you just take a nap as Angewomon?"

"Well Ryan, it's not that simple. Staying in my digivolved form takes a lot of energy to maintain. I'm only able to hold it for about a day at most, but I usually prefer to change back before I run out of energy. That way I can still turn into Angewomon again in case there's an emergency."

"Ah, I see... Well, now that you mention it, it is getting kinda late... I think that we should go to sleep soon..."

"Yeah, I agree... I may not be drained from digivolving, but I still need to rest a bit more after that beating you gave me as Angewomon..."

"Hey, if you ever want a rematch, you know where to find me!" Gatomon said with a smirk

"Whatever kid, you just caught me off guard is all. I didn't expect you to be able to digivolve, but now that I know what to expect, things won't go the same way next time."

Renamon then walked off to her room of the cave in a huff. Gatomon giggled a bit before crawling off to her section as well. Ryan simply sighed.

"Well, at least I don't need to worry about getting bored... There's never a dull moment with those two around..."

Ryan then repeated the other two and headed off to his room. It was the smallest room of the cave, mainly due to the fact that he didn't need any more room than that. He couldn't grow like the other two could, so for him, this room was more than enough to satisfy him. The three cave-mates then fell asleep.


The next morning...
11111111122111.title: Setting the girls straight

111111111221112.content: Which digimon shows up this time?
111111111221112.title: Third time's the charm...

choices: "I've been assigned to keep an eye on you three, and Ryan in particular."
"You've been selected to take part in a special digimon tournament!"
1111111112211121.content:
The next morning, Ryan and the digi-girls were awakened from their sleep by the sound of someone knocking on the cave wall. The trio got up and walked to the entrance to be greeted by yet another digimon!

This one wasn't animal-like like Gaomon and Renamon. Instead she had the appearance of a mermaid, bar the fact that she had legs instead of a tail fin like most mermaids did. She had teal colored skin, and had slightly darker teal fins on the sides of both her head and her waist. She had a marking under her left eye that looked like long black eyelashes, and the tips of her bare feet were the same teal shade as her fins. She wore a light blue suit of 'armor' and a helmet with blue trim around the edges, and red jewels were placed in the wrists, knees, and helmet.

For those who can't imagine her, she looks like this: http://th09.deviantart.net/fs48/PRE/i/20...

As the trio stared at this new fish-girl standing before them, she simply smiled and waved at them.

"Hiya! I'm Ranamon, and you must be Ryan!"

She pointed toward Ryan and winked as she said that. Ryan looked shocked, and the two digi-girls stepped in front of him in defensive stances,.

"How do you know Ryan's name?!" Renamon barked

"Yeah, and what do you want with him?!" Gatomon continued

Ranamon just giggled and walked forward unintimidated. Renamon reacted swiftly and threw a punch at the mermaid digimon's face, but Ranamon's reflexes were just as sharp. She caught Renamon's fist in midair and grinned at her, she then lowered Renamon's fist back to her side. Ranamon the started wagging her finger at them.

"Uh, uh, uh... Is that any way to treat the partner of your friend over there? I think that you girls should just cool off."

Snapping her fingers, Ranamon made a pair of rain clouds appear over the two digi-girl's heads before hitting them with a light drizzle. The duo was left with their fur soaked, and Ranamon couldn't help but giggle at them. Gatomon was about to lunge at Ranamon in anger when Renamon put her arm out to stop her. The dripping cat looked up at her with a very irritated expression on her face.

"What gives, Renamon?! Let me go and clobber that overconfident fish!"

"Calm down, Gatomon! Aren't you at all interested in what she just said?"

"Yeah! What did you mean by 'my partner'?" Ryan chimed in

"Oh, I suppose you wouldn't know yet."

Ranamon then pulled out a small cellphone-like device on a necklace that was tucked into her 'armor'. She then took the necklace off and handed it to Ryan.

"This is your digivice. It will allow you to stay in contact with all three of us digimon here, as well as a few other functions that I'll get into later. From now on, I'll be living alongside you three!"

"What?! WHY?!" Renamon and Gatomon said in unison

"Well you see..."
1111111112211121.title: Introducing: The legendary warrior of water!

11111111122111211.content:
Ryan looked at her shocked when he heard that she was sent to look after them especially him. He walked toward her and away from renamon and gatomon.

“Who sent you?” he asked wanting to know

Ranamon put a hand on his shoulder and she said in a comforting voice “Sorry ryan, but I can’t say and I can say that I’m here to help you.”

“I hope you won’t lead those people to here since I’m the one they want and my parents vanished without a trace.” He said sadly at the memory

There was silence filled the air till renamon and gatomon shrink down to his size and they hugged him tightly as he was silently shedding tears. He felt his back being rubbed so he calmed down and wiped away the tears, but ranamon joined the group hug and helped him feel better.

“You can count on me to help protect you from those people.” She said confidently smiling

“Ryan.” Renamon said as she gave him a small squeeze

“You have an angel watching over you, ryan.” Gatomon said smiling

Ryan just stood there slient and he was thinking about what happened to him, his family both real and fake parents, and now his friends and partners. He is looking at the ground while he was thinking and he stop thinking for about a minute and look at them.

“Alright you three now let me go.” He said darkly as they did what he asked

He went to his room to find his weapons are where he left them and he has some knives, swords, and guns; but he picked all of them before leaving his room of the cave and walking into the forest.

They were confused because they felt the seriousness from him and they wondered why he those with him so they went to see what he was going to do. When they came out of the cave, ryan is slicing the tree leaves in half as they fall and he was focused as if he was a master with his swords.

“Whoa.” All three said together surprised as he put his swords back into their sheaths and he walks back into the cave smiling into his room

“I get it.” Renamon said as she smiled

“Huh?” ranamon and gatomon said confused even more

“Ryan was running from his problems and his adopted parents, but now he decided to stop running and start fighting back.” She explained to them and they nodded in agreement

They walk back into the cave where ryan is waiting for them.

“Ranamon, can you explain the digivice to us?” ryan asked

“Sure.” She said as she was about to start the explanation
11111111122111211.title: "I've been assigned to keep an eye on y...

choices: "How about we go to the digital world so that you can all do some training?"
"We still don't know much about you, Ranamon. Let's get to now eachother better"
111111111221112111.content:
Taking the digivice back from Ryan, Ranamon held it in her hand and began her explanation.

"First of all, this digivice serves as a communicator. Like I said before, it will allow you to keep in contact with all three of us. It's synched to the data signatures of your partner digimon, so you can talk to any of us whenever you want no matter where you are. This is just the most basic function, though. There are a couple more useful functions built in as well."

Ranamon then pressed a red button below the screen on the device, and the display of a typical cellphone screen shifted to a high-tech display. It showered three images, one of each of the digigirls, and had a line with several arrows pointing off from from it in a branching pattern flowing out from each image. The arrows pointed to several silhouettes of various shapes and sizes, but one of Gatomon's arrows was pointing toward an image of Angewomon. Ranamon pointed at this image.

"The second, and arguably most important, function of the digivice is to allow you to control the digivolutions of your partners at any given point. If any of us are able to digivolve, the silhouette of the form we can become will be filled in. After that, you just has to touch the image on the screen to trigger a digivolution. Here, try it out by making Gatomon into an angel again."

Ranamon then tossed the cellphone device to Ryan, who caught it and pressed the image of Angewomon on the screen. The cocoon of light that appeared the first time she digivolved appeared again, but this time it was green instead of blue. When it faded away, Angewomon was back again.

"Sweet! I'm Angewomon again! But... Something is weird... Why don't I feel tired at all?" Usually I start to feel the strain of this form's power right after digivolving. But I feel as energetic as I do in Gatomon form..."

"That's because when you digivolve this way, your energy is amplified by the digivice's power. As such, you can stay in this form for much longer; you might as well say that this thing removes the time limit on your stronger forms."

"Really? Awesome! I love this form, but I never get to really enjoy it! Now I can stay like this as long as I want?"

"Well, It's really more of 'as long as Ryan wants you to be in that form'. He's got the digivice, and he's the only one who an use it, so he can control what forms we're in."

Ryan simply stared at Ranamon amazed.

"You mean that I can change you any time I want?"

"Exactly. But I would highly suggest that you keep us in our standard forms under ordinary circumstances and refrain from using advanced forms for a long period of time."

"Awww! Why?!" Angewomon complained

"Because, although it's incredibly rare, there have been cases where a digimon staying in their stronger forms longer than usual will lose control of their own bodies and go berserk. If you aren't used to maintaining that form for longer than a day, issues could occur if you suddenly use it for a full week."

"Oh man... So much for that idea..."

"Don't worry Angewomon! As long as you build up your stamina in that form, you'll eventually be able to manage it for extended periods of time just as safely as your Gatomon form! Just be sure to take it slow, and you'll be fine."

"Really?! So if I just take it an hour at a time, I'll be able to stay like this for months on end eventually?!"

"Sure! It will take a lot of work to get to that point, but if you're dedicated enough to do it, then it's possible!"

"Hurray! I can't wait to get started!"

Ranamon smiled and placed her hand on Angewomon's shoulder.

"Hold you horses, girl! I still haven't explained the final function yet!"

"Oh yeah... Sorry... Please go ahead then..."

"Thank you. Now, as I'm sure you know, the digital world and this world are separate dimensions. The final function of a digivice is to open a portal between these two dimensions. This way, you can travel from one world to the other at will!"

"Wow... This thing seems really amazing for something so small..." Ryan said as he stared at the small cellphone-like device in his hand.

"Yep! So, what do you wanna do now Ryan?"

Ryan thought about this for a bit before deciding.
111111111221112111.title: Explaining the digivice's functions

1111111112211121112.content:
“Ranamon, you know about me and we don’t know you.” Ryan said to her

“Please tell us about yourself.” Renamon said with gatomon nodded

“Yes tell us.” Gatomon said in agreement

“Alright I’ll tell you three about me.” Ranamon said to them

Soon she started to talk about herself.
1111111112211121112.title: "We still don't know much about you, Ra...

choices: no you don't have a choice and neither do I.
11111111122111212.content:
"A tournament?" renamon said
"What kind of tournament" gatomon asked
"Do we have a choice?" ryan asked her as renamon and gatomon looked at him
11111111122111212.title: "You've been selected to take part in a...

choices: "We think that it sounds awesome! Let's do it, Ryan!"
"We think that it sounds like way too much trouble... Is it okay if we pass?"
111111111221112121.content:
Hearing Ryan's response, Ranamon simply giggled.

"Well Ryan, you aren't required to enter the tournament if you don't want to... But you have no idea how huge an honor it is to be selected for this! Only 32 kids worldwide are chosen to become digimon tamers and enter! You were selected because there's something special about you, Ryan. You could potentially be one of the greatest digimon tamers in the world!"

Ryan stared at Ranamon in shock. Renamon and Gatomon were equally confused.

"What do you mean by that? How do you know that Ryan is special? How does he have this potential?" Renamon asked

"Because, Renamon, both of his parents had significant interaction with digimon before he was born. Ryan's parents both became very close to one particular digimon; they became friends with you, Renamon. As such, digimon taming is in his genes. And it looks like the fate of his parents has lead him to you as well!"

Gatomon was getting suspicious of the new 'guest'. She lunged at Ranamon and held her razor sharp claw right under the mermaid's neck. Ranamon was unfazed, and simply stared the cat digimon in the eye.

"Well, someone here sure is feisty. Is there something that you want?"

"Yeah! I want to know how you know so much about Ryan! Where do you get your information?!"

"Oh, I'm not the one who gathered the information. My superiors gave me a complete file on his history, as well as his family background and anything else that would be helpful. I honestly don't know where they get their information, but I've been assigned to serve as Ryan's partner should he accept the invitation to the tournament. I guarantee you that I have no ill intention in coming here today."

Gatomon lowered her claw and backed off, feeling more or less satisfied with the mermaid's answer. Being an angelic digimon, she was able to sense when someone was lying. Ranamon was telling her the truth, so there was no reason to be suspicious for now. Just then, Ryan spoke up.

"I don't get it, Ranamon. I've already got Renamon and Gatomon... Why would they send you to be my partner?"

"Well, that's actually quite simple. The tournament is in a 3 on 3 format, with each tamer pitting their team against their opponent's. For tamers who don't have enough digimon to satisfy this condition, the hosts of the tournament will provide an additional partner to the participants. It's held in a bracket style, so if you can defeat six opponents and come out on top, you win."

"So does that mean that you'll be leaving me after the tournament?"

"Oh, no. My superiors are quite generous. Since many digimon would have become friends with their human partners, they will be allowed the choice of staying with them after the battles are over or returning to the organization again. It really doesn't make sense to tear up a friendship after it's already formed, does it?"

"Well, no... I guess not... I have one more question, though..."

"Oh really? If it's rather or not I intend to stay with you, I will. I've honestly been interested in you ever sense I read your file, and I'd love to get to know you."

"Thanks Ranamon, but I was really just wondering if you were able to change size like these two can."

"Is that all? Well of course I can! That's actually a pretty common ability among us digimon. It's just a simple matter of reconfiguring the data that makes up our bodies into a larger file size. In theory, we could also shrink with the same method, but why would anyone want to do that?"

"Well, everyone has their own preferences I guess. I personally like the size I'm at just fine, but to each their own..."

"I suppose... So Ryan, what's your decision? Will you and your friends here come with me and enter the Digiworld Grand Championship?"

"Don't ask me. They're the ones who'll have to be fighting in this thing. What do you think girls? Do you wanna enter?"

Renamon and Gatomn looked at each other and thought about the offer for a minute before nodding in agreement. They then responded in unison:
111111111221112121.title: Will they be heading off to battle?

1111111112211121211.content:
“Sure we will be happy to being in the tournament.” Gatomon said smiling

“And win it.” Renamon added

“Well ranamon, you have your answer.” Ryan said to her

“I’m glad to hear it.” Ranamon said

They left cave to head to the digimon tournament.
1111111112211121211.title: "We think that it sounds awesome! Let's...

choices: "Maybe someone will come help us get there."
11111111122111212112.content:
As the group exited the cave, Ryan paused for a moment. Ranamon and the others looked over to him confused.

"What's wrong Ryan? I thought we were going to enter the tournament!" Gatomon said anxiously.

"Well, didn't Ranamon say it was held in the digital world?"

"Yeah, and?"

"How the heck do we even get to the digital world?!"

"..."

"See? Ranamon needs to explain this before we can go anywhere!"

All three of them looked at their new partner in anticipation. Ranamon simply smiled.

"That's an easy one, Ryan. All you have to do is hit the center button on your digivice and it'll open a portal for us!"

Ryan was surprised that the tiny cellphone device he held was able to do such a thing, but he listened to Ranamon and pressed the button. In an instant, Ryan and the others saw a massive blue vortex appear before them. Ranamon simply giggled and jumped into it. The others stared at it for a moment before Gatomon stepped toward it.

"Well, come on guys! Last one in is a rotten sardine!"

The energetic cat then lept through the portal just as Ranamon had. Renamon simply sighed before growing to 15 feet tall. She then picked up Ryan and prepared to enter the portal.

"Come on Ryan, we can be rotten sardines together..." she joked before jumping in after the others.

They flew through a blue tunnel for several minutes, and Renamon shrank back to normal as they waited to reach their destination. When the four friends emerged from the portal, they looked around in confusion. They were all expecting to wind up in some futuristic city, but instead they were in the middle of a jungle! All eyes quickly turned to Ranamon once again. She simply looked at them confused.

"What? What did I do?"

"Why are we in a jungle?! Aren't we supposed to be in the tournament zone?!" Gatomon said frustrated.

"Look, I don't know what went wrong! Ryan, let me see your digivice!"

"Alright, here..."

Ryan handed her the device, and after taking a moment to examine the screen, Ranamon let out a groan before facepalming.

"What is it?" Ryan asked.

"My stupid superiors set your digivice to the wrong destination code! The point where we enter the digital world is supposed to be Cyber City, the central hub of the digital world's society. But this thing is set to send us to the Wi-fi Jungle! We're at least a full 2 day's worth of walking away from the tournament site!"

"WHAT?!" all three of them said in unison.

"Yeah! And to make matters worse, the tournament is only 3 days away! We should have been able to use that time to get some training in at the tournament preparation facility, but now we're gonna be using it just to get to the place!"

Gatomon plopped down on her rear and sighed.

"Well this is just great! How do we get there now?!"

"Only one thing to do, Gatomon. We've got to start walking." Renamon said.

"Awww, come on! There has to be a better way! Right Ryan?!"


How will Ryan respond?
11111111122111212112.title: The wrong destination code!

choices: Nate and his crew meet Ryan.
111111111221112121121.content:
"What now?"

A young man was walking in the Digital World with his Digimon. They were walking around in the same jungle that Ryan and his Digimon were in. This man was a laid back and calm. He was 21 years old and had an calm demeanor. He had three loyal Digimon that were traveling with him.

Lilamon: who is possibly his most loyal to him. He calls her Susana, as she reminds him of a sweetheart back in the human world. Susana and Nate had met two years ago, and as far as he could remember, she has helped him through thick and thin since he discovered the new world. Their relationship has been built on a bond forged on trust.

Falcomon and Gaomon are Nate's other companions, who he met a year ago. They both are considered to have a brotherly like relationship with their tamer. Falcomon acts of a wisdom brother who reminds the group to stick together and not to get too high or low on themselves. He keeps the group tight-knit and together.

As for Gaomon, he keeps the groups sprits up by fighting or simply cheering them on. He is considered to be the engine that roars, if he isn't fighting the good fight, he will be a force in most situations. Gaomon is basically the will of the group.

"We're going to test our skills." Nate said, as he sat up. "We're going to enter the tournament. I think our experiences will allow us to surprise a few people." Nate then was drinking from a water canteen.

"Why not." Falcomon said. "You're right Nathan. I believe we all have a shot to win over some people, and maybe the whole thing. I believe that we'll do our best."

"That's right!" Gaomon pitched in. "Look for us to own the competition! We're the best team there is! No one can stop us!"

"Oh calm down you two." Susana said. "We're there to have fun. Besides, this can go a long way in our development. Although, you two must be able to reach your mega levels soon!"

Nate then stood up. He looked at his digivice and looked at Falcomon. He gave him a slight nod and went ahead and evolved Falcomon into Peckmon. Peckmon looked around and nodded his head.

"Shall we head to the arena then." Peckmon said. "I'm sure my jumps should be able to launch us into the arena. And plenty of space on my back."

"Good." Nate said. "I'm sure we'll run into someone who might want to hitch a ride with us to the tournament. Susana, Gaomon, let's roll."

"Right!"

The group started to travel through the jungle. Gaomon and Susana rested, while Nate was still awake. He was prepared for this tournament; even if he didn't win, he was looking forward to the challenge for battling new opponents. He continued to drink from his canteen. 'This is like a second family. These guys are more than just creatures, but my friends. Susana, you've always been there for me even in my darkest moments. You remind me of her. Ever since she went missing, my heart has been heavy, but you fill me with hope that I will find her again. Thanks Susana. You're like a sister to me.'

"Nate!" Peckmon said. "I see a boy and three digimon ahead, you think they need help getting to the tourney?"

"Had a feeling. Let's get to them and ask if they need help getting there."
111111111221112121121.title: Enter Nate.

1111111112211121211211.content:
Nate and Peckmon stopped and Nate jumped down. He drank some water out of his canteen and observed the boy and three digimon.

"You guys lost?" Nate said.

Ryan noticed the person before narrowing his eyes like he was sensing something from the person. He nodded before motioning Renamon to shrink herself back to normal size. He jumped down and land on the ground with ease.

"Yeah, we got the wrong destination code and we have to hurry so we can have time to train." Ryan said

~He feels like me for a strange reason.~ Ryan thought.

"You want to ride with us?" Nate said. "We're heading to the to tournament. You can ride with us. Peckmon can get us out of this jungle quickly. There's plenty of space."

Ryan turn to his digi-friends and Gatomon shrunk back down to her original size before jumping onto Ryan's shoulder.

"Ryan when are we going to get another chance like this?" Gatomon asked him and Renamon nodded agreeing with her.

"I'm going have to see about my superiors giving you the right cordinates, but she is right. I highly doubt we will get another chance like this." Ranamon said nodding as Ryan turned to the person and nodded.

"Yeah, we need a lift." He said

"Hop on." Nate said, walking back to Peckmon. "We don't mind dropping you guys off. We're heading there and I had a gut feeling someone would have trouble traveling to the arena. Don't mind the other two digimon. They're my teammates for the tourney as well."

Ryan nodded before turning to his team. "You three get on; I need to have a word with our friend." Ryan said and they looked at him.

"Ryan?" Renamon asked putting a hand on his shoulder

"I'll be fine, Renamon." he said

She nodded before they got on Peckmon waiting for him and Nate.

Nate turned, and noticed Ryan's expression. "Peckmon. Give me a minute. I believe there's more to this kid than meets the eye."

Nate climbed down and walked toward Ryan.

"Something on your mind?"

"You lost someone close to you and you are trying to find them. I know because I'm looking for my real parents." Ryan said with a serious face.

"I felt that we are the same in a way." He added.

Nate drank from his pocket canteen and nodded.

"You're very mature for someone your age." Nate then looked off into the distance. "You're correct. I've lost someone dear to me. Someone special. A sweetheart."

"I had to be since I was living in the forest when Renamon came to see me. My parents both met her so I had to find her and see about finding my real parents. I had to run from foster parents, i couldn't stand it there and they were trying to send people after me so they can bring me 'home'." Ryan explained. "Renamon is like family to me and Gatomon with Ranamon might be apart of it soon enough." he added

Nate nodded. "That's good to hear. Life can deal us a cruel hand at times. I'm glad you could find digimon that can act like a family to you. My team over there is like a second family to me as well. Susana, Gaomon and Falcomon are my digital family you could say."

"Do you want to find the people we are looking for together?" Ryan asked.

"I think we could work together well." Nate said. "Hopefully they are in one piece."

"Dad wouldn't let them get hurt. he is a fighter and a protector." Ryan said confident in his father.

"Your father sounds like a good man." Nate said.

"He cares for mom, my aunt, Renamon and some other people." Ryan said nodding his head.

"Should we get going then?" Nate said.

"I heard that dad had a dark side of himself and a strange power of an armored animal." Ryan said before nodding again.

"Yeah, I need to see about my team's teamwork." he added

"The girl I'm looking for, her dad died while doing research here in the digital world. He had a lot of passion for the study for Digimon. She shares his passion."

"Do you think she could be my sister figure?" Ryan asked. "She sounds like fun." He added.

Nate nodded. "I'm sure she can. She's a lot of fun to be around. Very bubbly personality. It's been five years since I've seen her. But I'm sure she still has her lovely charm."

"You can be my brother." Ryan said smiling at the thought of having more of a family.

Nate had a slight smile. "Well, it'd be nice to have a brother away from home that's human as well."

"Can I ask about your family and parents?" Ryan asked

"Well, my mother is back home in our world. She's been a huge part of my life and has played the role of shaping myself as a person. My father sadly died before I could meet him. He was a police officer and was gunned down by thugs. So I grew up with out a father figure, so I'm learning how to become a man on my own. I'm an only child."

"I try to do my family proud. After I graduated High School, I moved to an apartment not too far from my mother so I can watch over her at times, while living on my own. My sweetheart inspired me to forge a relationship between Digimon and Humans. I hope to find her and accomplish our mission together."

Ryan gave Nate a brotherly hug before patting his head.

"Maybe I can help after I find my real parents." He said

"Thanks Bud." Nate said. "I appreciate the kindness. And that would be great."

"Lets get going." Ryan said before walking to Peckmon and jumping on between Renamon and Ranamon with Gatomon in his lap.

"Everything ok, ryan?" Renamon asked looking at him seeing a smile.

"Yep, just getting a new friend and brother." Ryan said and she smiled.

"Brother? You look nothing alike." Gatomon said.

"A brother figure." Ranamon said smiling before hugging Ryan.

Renamon hugged Ryan as well and Gatomon did the same.

"A brother figure." Ranamon said smiling before hugging ryan as Renamon hugged ryan as well and gatomon did the same.

Nate walked over to Peckmon. "He's a good kid. Very wise for his age."

Peckmon nodded. "He's special. Alright everyone. We're taking off."

Ryan nodded before holding gatomon close so she won't fall off. Renamon and ranamon did the same to ryan.

"Ready." He said

Peckmon then took off, and the group headed towards to the tournament.

"Nate, Why are you going to the tournament?" Ryan asked

"To test my strength and bond with my Digimon. I also plan to push my plan to involve others in the assistance of bridging the Human-Digimon relations. The more people get invovled, the better."

"Renamon, do you have sisters?" Ryan asked her

"Two of them, one black and one silver." She said and he nodded

"Virus and Vaccine." He said

"Do you know where they went?"

"Like your parents in hiding to protect them,"

"Maybe I can meet them." he said with hope.

"Maybe." She siad

~He is like kain to want to meet with my two sisters.~ Renamon thought.

"How you holding up, Peckmon?" Nate said.

"Fairly well, no worries here."

"Can you use weapons, Nate?" ryan asked

"I'm fairly skilled in using one weapon. I have a reliable metal staff."

"Knives, swords, and some guns in case i have no more arrows for my bow." Ryan said

Nate nodded. "Well-Armed."

"How long till we're there?"

"Not too long." Peckmon said.

"Maybe you can help me with training, Nate."

"Why not?" Nate said
1111111112211121211211.title: Nate's Story and A Possible Bond With Ryan.

11111111122111212112111.content:
Susana and Gaomon came to, noticing the four new guests on board.

"Nate?" Gaomon said, quickly getting up. "Who are these guys?"

Nate walked over to his other Digimon partners.

"They are friends, the kid over there is Ryan, and his Digimon over there is Renamon, Gatomon, and Ranamon. They are entering the Tournament as well." Nate said, and then drinking from his canteen.

"Oh." Gaomon said. "Really? Well. I guess it's fine. I mean, who knows, maybe we'll face them in the tournament?"

"The kid seems to be wise for his age." Susana said. "Any reason for that?"

"He's been though a lot; a lot no kid his age should encounter." Nate said. "But he's strong, and pure. Not sure I know much more beyond that. But you two must treat him like he's apart of the gang. I know you guys will welcome him with open arms."

"Got it!" The two digimon said in unison.

Nate nodded, and looked back at Ryan as he was conversing with his Digimon. He noticed the family like feeling that Ryan and his Digimon were sharing. Ryan looked very happy and at home with them and Nate could tell. He felt as if the kid and him could both reach and succeed their goals. Who knew, maybe their lost ones were together. Nate then had a brief vision of her

It was a quick scene of him and her looking at her computer screen, and him learning about his first Digimon, Augmon. He remembered how she described it to him and that's when he first become interested in Digimon. Her calm green eyes and her dirty blonde hair made Nate feel very peaceful, and he felt that he was in utter bliss.

"We're here!" Peckmon cried out. "Brace yourselves!"

Nate snapped back to reality and turned around. "Everyone, grab hold of Peckmon and don't let go!"

Peckmon dashed and went for a long jump, soaring though the air in a long distance. The arena was not too far, as Peckmon and the crew landed inside the arena.

"Everyone alright?" Nate said, calmly drinking his canteen.

"No worries." Ryan said. "We're fine over here."

"Good." Nate said. "You all ready to get this started? It's going to be a fun time."

The crew hopped down from Peckmon, and Peckmon reverted back to Falcomon.

"Good work getting us here," Nate said.

"No problem Nate, it was my pleasure." Falcomon replied, high fiving his tamer.
11111111122111212112111.title: Onward to the Tourney.

111111111221112121121111.content:
The building that is holding the tournament is shaped like the Rome coliseum and half as tall, but there is a shield to keep the wild digimon away up to mega or super ultimate. There are barracks for the contestants, training fields, a pool, a game room, and a fully equip gym. The lobby is the first room when they walked in and there is a registration desk. Both teams walked up to the desk to see the secretary on the phone talking with someone and she told them that they have to wait a moment. They were waiting for the secretary to get off the phone. Renamon put Ryan on her shoulder so he could see the secretary. After a moment, the secretary put the phone back on the hook. Nate looked around.

'Competition will be interesting' he thought.

"Are you registering for the tournament?" the secretary asked Nate not seeing Ryan.

"That's right."

"Are all of them on your team?" she asked still not looking at Ryan.

"No. I only have three."

"Did my favorite nephew come by for the tournament?" asked a certain general with peppered red raid walking over to the desk.

"I haven't seen him." the secretary said

"I'm right here." Ryan said scaring the secretary and getting a laugh from the general.

"You have done a good job, Ranamon." the general said and said digimon nodded

Nate watched. "I'm guessing you two know each other."

Ryan looked at him and nodded. Nate nodded and started to drink from his canteen once more.

"She is the owner of the diner in my town when dad was working there and I think mom did two."

"They aren't related by blood, but I call her my aunt."

Nate nodded once again. "I see."

"General, Ryan was given the wrong destination code and ended up in the Wi-Fi Jungle." Ranamon said and Ryan nodded.

"Thanks for telling me. I'm going to see about getting him the right code before the end of the tournament." she said before giving Ryan a hug and peck on the cheek. She looked at renamon before smiling.

"They would be proud of you watching him." she said to her before walking away to deal with the issue ranamon gave her

"Which digimon are on your teams?" the secretary asked them.

"Gaomon, Falcomon and Susana."

"That's me!" Susana cried

"And this Susana is what type?"

"Lalamon."

"Renamon, Gatomon, Ranamon are mine." Ryan said and the secretary nodded.

"Let me see your digivices and they will get you registered." she said

Nate handed his Digivice to the Secretary. Ryan did the same still slightly confused by it.

~Have to get ranamon to explain it to me.~ ryan thought.

She put them in the machine before a ding went off and they were done. (same method of ash in pokémon getting registered)

"Another renamon, you kid need to watch out for the team that has two renamon and a wizardmon." she warned him

Nate took his Digivice. "Almost show time guys."

Ryan narrowed his eyes. "Why?"

"Because the tamer was going to come the person that has the last renamon."

"Any reason why?" Nate said

"This tamer wants to be the next kain who was able to become a renamon since his team was all renamon."

Ryan started to growl. Nate noticed the reaction by Ryan.

"No one can be like my father." he said

"This tamer sounds like an ass." gatomon said before she was bopped on the head by renamon for her mouth.

Ranamon took ryan and lead him to the barracks. Renamon noticed something and saw a faint shadow of an armored dragon or tiger over ryan.

~Hopefully the berserker side doesn't come out.~ she thought.

"You'd think if a tamer had other motives, you guys would look into that situation." Nate said as he walked away with his Digimon

The secretary told renamon and gatomon something else before they caught up to nate.

"We will be sharing the same room." she said

Nate nodded. "Fair enough."

"If I know those two renamon and the wizardmon, then they are my sisters and gatomon's old friend."

"You planning on catching up?"

"What do you mean?"

"If you know each other, wouldn't you want to catch up?"

"Sight problem with that." the voice of the general came form of her leaning on a wall.

"If the tamer sees ryan with the renamon, then he will target him for sure, but ryan isn't ready yet for a full battle and he is like his father." she said

"You sure he isn’t endangering lives here?"

"If he is, then ryan will stop him if he has to tap into the power that his father gave him."

Nate turned away. "Well. I'm not saying you guys aren't doing your job. But you should be careful on letting things escalate that far."

"I know she means." Renamon had a flashback to when kain was fighting a myotismon in his armored form.

"Kain was in a life and death situation or was knocked so hard that the berserker side came out to fight back my sister argent." renamon said

"Doing that to ryan will either bring the armored form or the berserker side out of him."

Nate cracked his knuckles and looked at the sky. "Well. Looks like it will be a grand event either way. Despite the circumstances..."

"There will be an exhibition match before the first round after the three days are up."

Nate nodded. "Anything else we should know before we take our leave."

"The three missing people are together in hiding after the third one vanished."

"There is a hidden rule when three different types of the same digimon are on two different teams."

Nate clinched his fist. "Alright then....Gaomon and Falcomon. You head to the room with Ryan's crew. Susana. You're coming with me. Any last words about the tournament or anything should be aware of?"

"If I know anything more, I’ll let ryan know or send you a message on your digivice."

"Ryan will need some help with training and learning how to use a three digimon team."

"I can't help him like I did with kain."

"I'm General Salen."

Nate nodded once more. "General Salen, Name's Nate. I'm sure we’ll talk again."

"I trust you and your team to watch over ryan like renamon the other two on his team are doing."

"He traveled with us and sees us as his second family. And especially at a time like this; he'll need a mentor, someone he can look to."

"So rest your head, General. You won't lose sleep. I will look out for the kid."

She nodded offering a rare smile.

"I'll keep trying to find those three for you and the kid."

Nate turned to the General. "Much appreciated."

Nate looked at Susana then back at the rest of the group. "We'll return." The two walked away.

The general nodded before walking back to her office trying to find the kid's parents and new sister for his brother. The four digimon went to the room ranamon and ryan were in.
111111111221112121121111.title: Registering  in the Tourney.

1111111112211121211211111.content:
Nate moved to a remote area where he and Susana were sitting and talking. It was a forested area where a lake was not too far away. Nate refilled his canteen with water and had Susana purify the water. He then started to do a mini workout.

"Something on your mind Nate?" Susana said. "Although you seem to do this when somethings on your mind..."

Nate was doing some push-ups on the ground.

"Well..." Nate said. "You know me. I need sometime to think about things right now. Most importantly, the fact that we may be able to find her is my key goal." He then sat up and rested for ten seconds, drinking some of his water and then jumping and doing high knees. "I will find her. It's been too long. For her mother, it'd mean the world, and I made a promise to find her, even if she isn't alive. The best I can do is to try."

"I can see why you too love each other so much." Susana said. "You seem like you've always done what you can for her."

Nate nodded, and went into his bag and revealed his staff, which was shown to extendable to a long length. Then he went in between two sets of trees and stuck his staff in the middle to use as a pull up bar. He then got some wrap to tie around his palms, and grabbed on to the staff and continued to workout.

"You too are like her, my friend. Kind and Sweet. Before I met Falcomon and Gaomon, you protected me and walked me through the Digital World. You're my first friend here, and every time I'm here you make me feel like I'm apart of the place. For that your friendship in invaluable."

Nate then flipped over and then used his legs to pull up as well.

"But for the most part, I'm fine. Just working out eases my mind and body. And you know how I am about my workouts. If not back in the human world, then it must be done here."

Nate then pulled himself back down to the ground. "If there's trouble to be had at this tournament, be ready. I know we're all here for fun and competition, but I'm concerned about Ryan. He seems to have a power that can possibly be dangerous, and if this tamer tries anything; we wait until the time is right to intervene. Gaomon will be a bit antsy, as usual, but you and Falcomon know to wait. I just want everything to go smoothly as possible. But in the event it doesn't, be ready. The kid is important. His family situation is a tough one; and I want to give him some stability in his life. A kid his age should be carefree and not stressed."

Nate used his canteen to get some water on his face to get rid of sweat and wrote in a small notepad to track his reps.

"You're going to be sore in the morning." Susana said. "And we don't need you to be hampered by anything when it's time for the real thing."

"You sound like Falcomon, Susana." Nate slightly laughed. "I'll be fine. If the room we're staying has showers, then I'm taking two. It won't be a problem."

Nate had mostly a lean built figure, about 6'1. Has toned arms mostly, but all round fit body. His hair was a low cut, black. He had facial hair, goatee. Nate then proceeded to put on a shirt over his muscle tee he was training in, wearing sweats as well. He also put on a red cap his father used to wear when they went to watch their favorite football team. Nate looked at the sky, and had all his things packed.

"The sun is setting. I think we've spent enough time here for now." Nate said, pulling the bag over his shoulder. "Let's head back."
1111111112211121211211111.title: Nate's Resolve.

11111111122111212112111111.content:
Ryan was sleeping in the bed after a shower with ranamon washing his back. She was watching him when the four digimon came in and she explained to him how his digivice worked.

"Resting up?" Falcomon said.

Ranamon nodded rubbing Ryan’s back.

"I explained to him how his digivice works."

Gaomon nodded. "Cool. He will be a pro with the Digivice quickly. "

Renamon and gatomon sat on the bed keeping Ryan safe.

"I remember kain using his armored beast form and he was powerful while able to control lightning, but his berserker form is a lot more dangerous and I don't remember his renamon form when he tried it. I think he was a dark red renamon if I remember right." Renamon explained.

"The move was called Trinity burst I think, I don't know." She added.

"Was he able to control himself?" Falcomon inquired.

"Kain when in berserker mode fight like an animal only using his instincts and he almost killed my sister, argent, if I didn't stop him. It only happened once that I can remember." She said.

"What's the origin of this berserker mode?"

"Pass down through history and family mostly."

"Interesting." Falcomon said.

"If it happens with Ryan, I’m the only one who can stop him." She said.

"Makes sense." Falcomon replied.

Ryan turned over and grabbed gatomon before holding her close. "kitty-chan." he said in his sleep and she started to grow to be a head taller than him. The bed was still staying strong.

"Wonder when Nate’s coming back."

"Soon." renamon said.

"He usually leaves for a while." Falcomon said. "Nothing new."

Ryan's grip on gatomon started to get tight and he started to shake. "Mom. Dad. Where.....are.......you?" He said in his sleep.

Gaomon looked over. "He's having a bad dream."

"Don't leave me." He said more in his sleep before renamon picked them up and laid Ryan on top of her with gatomon on her keeping him sandwiched between them.

"It's okay ryan. We'll find them." Renamon said in his ear. The shaking almost stopped.

"Gaomon if you want to rest, then don't wait up on me." Falcomon said.

"When Ryan fights the tamer, it will be one of his honor and no one can help him." Renamon said.

Renamon moved over so ranamon could be with them calming Ryan down from the dream.

"Understood." Falcomon said.

Gaomon was already sleeping on a bed. Renamon was still awake, but gatomon and ranamon fell asleep with Ryan.

“I have no doubt you will tell Nate what I told you, but it’s ok. I know you four will care for him like I do as a family." She said.

"There will be things Ryan has to do on his own, but he will know that we will be there to help him." She added before drifting to sleep.

Meanwhile, Nate knocked on the door of the room and Falcomon let him and Susana in.

"We're back." Susana said quietly, assuming everyone was asleep.

Nate looked around. "Everyone seems to be resting. Any news Falcomon?"

"Ryan's Renamon is counting on us. It seems like it’s important to everyone we've talked to today to protect Ryan." Falcomon said. "It's best we try to assist him and treat him as family."

Nate nodded and then sat his bag down. "You guys get some rest. I'm going to sleep in a minute."

"Best be careful Nate." Falcomon said. "We're in here if you need us. But rest well and see you in the morning."

Susana went into her own bed, as well as Falcomon. As for Nate, he decided to climb up to the roof of the room building. He lay down on his back and looked at the moon in deep thought. 'I'll be seeing you soon. Just hold on for me. Hold on for your mom. Hold on for us.' Nate then shut his eyes. 'Just hold on and we're going home...'

At that moment, Ryan bolted up breathing hard looking around already know his partners are trying to calm him down.

"Weird dream turned almost a nightmare." he said.

"What did you see?" renamon asked.

"Something, but Nate has to be here." He said.

"He is on the roof." renamon said sensing him.

Falcomon also awakened. "Something wrong?"

"I saw something in my dream and someone needs to get him." Ryan said calming down.

"I see. One moment." Falcomon went to get Nate.

Gatomon walked over to Susana and gaomon to wake them up.

Falcomon came over to Nate who was silently sleeping on the roof. "Nate...."

"Yes, Falcomon?" Nate said his eyes still closed.

"You're needed." Falcomon said.

Nate stood up and slid down the roof. Falcomon followed.

"There a problem?" Nate looked around. "Everyone's awake."

"I had a weird dream that turned to an almost nightmare." Ryan said sitting on gatomon's lap.

"I saw something there." he added.

"What did you see?" Nate said.

"Mom, dad, and your sweetheart" he said.

Nate eyes widened. "Your mom and dad, I understand, I'm not sure how'd you see her."

Nate then turned away from the group. "That's just impossible. She's been missing for years."

"They saved her from a digimon and went into hiding. She knows that you are looking for her and will do the best she can for you." he said.

"Alright." Nate said, still turned away. "Anything else?"

"They are either in the real world or here in the digital world. I do not know yet. I might get another dream telling me where." Ryan said walked over to Nate and gave him a hug fit for a brother.

"They might be using the dreams to talk with me." he added.

"Did you have these dreams before I met you?" Nate said.

"And thanks kid. I appreciate it. I really do."

"No. I never had dreams like that before I meet you."

"Strange." Nate said. "Alright."

Ryan let go before walking back to his bed and gatomon put him on renamon before getting on top of him while ranamon gets the side.

"I don't think I can go back to sleep yet" he said

"Take your time." Nate said. "Everyone sleeps differently for many reasons."

"Something else was weird and it came from dad." he said

"Your Berserker side."

Ryan shook his head.

"No, it was about being able to be renamon like he was and he knows that I can beat that tamer that has renamon's sister and gatomon's old friend." he explained

"I see." Nate said.

"The dragon, wolf, and tiger." he said

"One of those was dad's armored beast form" he said

"Tell me more about your family. You guys seem to be different than the normal human."

Ryan chuckled. "Mom is the only real normal human in the family and her parents hated my dad. I don't know why, but they seemed to love me despite being his son." he said.

"They wanted to raise me for them, but didn't get the chance because of my foster parents and I couldn't let them get in trouble for me so I went straight for the forest I know renamon lived and tried to find her." he added

"I see." Nate said, leaning his back against the door

"Dad had a dream about renamon and mom she had a different meeting with her."

"It seemed the family house is always tied to renamon no matter who lives there and I was living there before they left. so in a way I was bound to see renamon in a matter of time"

"You guys are close." Nate said.

"Renamon is like a second mother to me and ranamon is like an aunt, but gatomon is alike a sister." he said getting smiles from his team and they hugged him.

"That's pretty cool." Nate smiled slightly.

"Aunt salen is in charge of the house while I’m away looking for my parents and those fosters can't do anything with me with them." ryan said

Nate nodded again.

"I want to show how much my team means to me, but I don't know how." ryan said finally getting sleepy again.

He got a kiss from his team on his forehead and cheeks before passing out to dreamland.

"Aww." Susana said. "Cute."

Nate nodded. "He'll learn how to show his appreciation for you guys. He has a lot of heart.

"It might show up as we in our giant forms, but ranamon might need some convincing." renamon said

"Well. If that's how he wants to show it, so be it." Nate said.

"Susana, can you grow like us?" renamon asked

"I'm not sure." Susana replied.

"You can try tomorrow when ryan is training with us and Nate." gatomon said before they went to sleep.

"Alright." Susana said.

Things were quiet and peaceful in the room. Nate left the room and returned to the roof to rest. Ryan kissed gatomon on the cheek and the same on his other two team members in his sleep.
11111111122111212112111111.title: Back at the Tourney Site...

111111111221112121121111111.content:
Nate had woken up, the sun beaming on his face, and hopped down from the roof. He had a rested well and was thinking about his sweetheart. 'Samantha...'

Nate was also concerned with the fact that there might be trouble as him and his partners was only here to have fun. Although he could handle himself, he didn't want to have to deal with any mess. Nate quietly opened the door to the room that he and the others were sharing. Everyone seemed to be asleep. Nate went into the shower, and finally cleaned up the stink that was on him. He grabbed his Digivice and his bag, leaving right out. He was dressed in jeans, tied a bandana around his forehead, and wore a muscle tee.

Nate eventually found himself in the main center of the tournament site. Being hungry, he decided to sit outside of the tournament center and eat his food he had packed for himself, which consisted of a few peanut butter and jelly sandwiches, some granola bars, with his canteen having water inside of it.

Not too far from where Nate was sitting, there were three tamers, and apparently they weren't having a civil conversation...

"Give it back!" A girl cried. "I need that!"

"For what, besides, we've seen your Digimon and they look weak!"

"That's right, you don't need your Digivice, so along little girl, you're really just a waste of time."

Nate quickly packed his things and ran over to the scene.

"Hey, hey!" Nate said. "There a problem going on here?"

"Yes, those two jerks took my Digivice and are playing catch with it!" The girl cried.

The two boys looked up and down at Nate, almost like they were scouting him.

"I'm afraid you guys better give the girl her Digivice back." Nate said. "She looks like she did nothing to you, and you guys seem like punks; preying on the weak."

"What you going to do it?" One of the boys said, him wearing a cap backwards. "We took it because she doesn't have a chance in this tournament. Her Digimon are weak, like her."

"That's right," the other boy, who had glasses, and jet black hair was holding the Digivice. "We're doing her a favor, so back off."

Nate cracked his knuckles and sighed. "I guarantee, you guys will regret this, keep it up. It doesn't matter that her Digimon are weak. Maybe she'd be able to do the impossible and win the whole thing. Anything could happen. So I'm going to tell you guys again... Give her her Digivice back."

"No!"

"I warned you."

Nate quickly jumped at the boy with glasses, and punched him in stomach, after that he followed it up to a roundhouse kick to the face. The other boy went for a strike, but Nate leaned out the way and grabbed his arm, then using his free arm to elbow him in the face, knocking that boy out. The boy in the glasses was trying to make a run for it, but Nate caught him and started to apply a triangle hold on the boy's right arm.

"Drop the Digivice, unless you want a broken arm." Nate said, applying more pressure.

"Ok! Ok!" The boy said, letting go of the girl's Digivice.

Nate then proceeded to knock the other boy out, annoyed.

"Here you go." Nate said, getting the Digivice and handing it to the girl.

"Thanks!" the girl said, "My name is Lori."

"Nate."

"So, how old are you Nate?" Lori asked. "Showed some awesome skills out there! I'm 16, and I've been a tamer for two years now!

"I'm 19." Nate said. "Brazilian Ju-Justu. I've been practicing it for three years. You going to be ok?"

"Yes," Lori said, appreciative of Nate's actions. "I'll see you around Nate!" Lori ran back to the tournament site.

Nate waved Lori off, and then noticed General Salen coming to investigate the scene.

"Nate?" General said. "What happened here?"

"Two boys tried to steal that girl's Digivice." Nate said, starting to walk back to his personal training spot near the creek. "I took care of the problem. I'm sure you guys will be able to ask them why they got knocked out."

Nate continued to walk off, while Salen looked puzzled and started to call for a team to retrieve the two boys.
