“I never really knew my parents, but my foster parents were always fighting I would leave to see ash and/or kain for the day before returning to that place. I met with their boss, salen, who was kind to me and she was a little scary at first; but she let me stay with her while ash and kain were working.

Soon ryan finished making dinner for them and gave ren a bowl of stew before getting himself some dinner.

“I met with the other co-workers that work with kain and ash, but I had to leave for home and I wanted salen to never have my parents know who I was with or what I was doing.”

“Why?”

“Because I didn’t want them to get hurt when my father would force me to tell him and my mother.”

“Kain and ash left me a note saying they were going to leave the town, but salen said that I could stay with her when I need to be away.”

“I’m looking for a giant fox because kain and ashe were friends with it, but they said that she had sisters and I would like to meet them.” Ryan said with a sad smile

“I’m sure that you will met this giant fox sooner than you think.” Ren said and ryan looked at her slightly confused

“Thank you for the meal and I have to leave.” Rena said and ryan turned and stopped her from leaving when he heard something outside

“You can’t leave yet.” Ryan said as he pulled out his bow and arrow before leaving his cave

“He has friends looking for me and they are the ones who set up the cameras.” Ryan said as ren nodded

~I have to get into my other form help him to my cave.~ ren thought

When ryan came outside, he was growling because someone or a group was close to his cave and he was not in the mood to move again so he was ready to fight. He readied an arrow and waited for something to move. There was a sound loud enough for ryan to make the arrow fly to the source of the sound and there was a scream before ryan sent another for the person to drop dead.

“I know you are there.” Ryan said as he readied another arrow

“Your parents are worried about you and they want you to come home.” Was heard before ryan killed the guy with the arrow

“They are not my parents.”

Something stepped on a twig and ryan reacted with speed so another dropped dead, but ryan needed to keep one alive.

“Just go back to the rat invested hole you came from and tell them that I’m fine without them.” Ryan said as something caught his eye and he fired another arrow

Another body dropped so ryan fired that left about three of them left since he keeping track of them. He heard something to his right and he fired another arrow, but he was running out of arrows.

“What is this kid?” was heard to his left

“Is he some kind of beast?” close to the one next to his friend

Ryan just fired two arrows into those guys foreheads between the eyes and they dropped like stones leaving the leader left.

“As I said, leave and don’t come back.” Ryan said as he fires his last arrow in the leader’s arm

“Alright, I’m going.” The leader said as he left ryan’s waterfall cave

Ryan stayed there till he couldn’t hear anything left of the leader before walking inside his cave and I finished eating the rest of his stew.

“Not even a day I have to move again or I’ll lose the next battle.” Ryan said thinking out-loud

“Ryan, I’m sorry for the trouble I caused.” Ren said and he looked at her

“It’s not your fault.” Ryan said smiling

“What do you mean?”

“Somehow they found me while you were with me and I doubt that you would help them unless you didn’t know about me.” Ryan said

“Ren, you have my trust and you are my friend.” He said with a happy smile

~How would he take the news about me in my true form?~ ren thought

Ryan finished off the dinner he made for himself and ren before putting out the fire.

“I have to find that fox before they find me again.” Ryan said as ren decided on something

“Ryan, did ash found out about me and the fox being related?” ren asked he looked at her

~So she is the fox and I thought she would told ashe before she moved away.~ ryan thought

“I don’t know; I didn’t get the chance to ask her.” Ryan said as he smiled a knowing smile

~He is smarter than he looks.~ ren thought with a smile as well

Ryan noticed with a growl before destroying the one camera in the cave then heading out and destroyed another one on the cave mouth. He vanished and destroyed the rest of the hidden cameras before reappearing and going back inside to see ren.

“We have to leave before he comes back with help.”
1211.title: Over dinner and something happens

12111.content:
Soon he finished packing his things and he was thinking about the meat on the drying racks.

“I can carry this, but I’m worried about the meat.” He said and she had an idea

“Do you trust me?” she asked and he knew that she going to reveal her true form

“Yes, I trust you.” He said showing a smile and she smiled back

She left for the cave as he went to destroy the remaining cameras in the area and he noticed ren transforming into the fox that he was looking for. He looked for any cameras that were watching this from the trees and he vanished for a moment with his knives and started to run around a group of trees and cutting them down.

“Good thing she was in the cave with the cave mouth covered.” He said as he finished cutting down the group of trees

“Were you looking?” renamon asked as she came out of the cave at her human height, but in her real form

“No.” he said as he kicked the cut trees in various directions and hear faint hissing sounds of cameras being broken

“You been doing destroying those since you been living in the forest?” she asked and he nodded

“I have been killing off their cameras and their men who have been coming after me since I have started living in the forest.” He said as they went back into the cave

He looked at for a moment seeing in her real form and he turned his head away from her.

“What’s wrong?” she asked

“I shouldn’t be looking at you right now since you almost have no clothes on.” He said

She smiled at him for being a gentleman and gave him a hug.

“Almost no clothes, but you don’t need to worry about that.” She said

She gave him another kiss on the cheek before she put him down and he went to get his pack ready for himself to carry. He came outside with his pack and she went inside to get all of the meat before coming back out carrying it in her paws before she started to grow in height to reveal her giant form to him. After she was in her giant form, she looked down at him with a kind smile and he smiled back before deciding to run up her leg and vanished again; but reappearing on her left shoulder.

“I thought you were her.” Ryan said sitting close to the base of her neck and she smiled

“Did you see me when you were at the lake?” she asked as she noticed that he was carrying his pack

“I noticed something in a tree and I think I saw a pair of ice blue eyes looking at me.” He said

“Do you have the herbs and berries you used for the stew?” she asked and he nodded

“I have everything in my pack except for the meat and I have my bow.” He said before she started to walk toward her own cave

“If you don’t mind I’ll eat the meat on the way to the cave since I will have food for us to eat when we get there and I can use the herbs that you have collected.” She said and he nodded

“I don’t mind at all. I was wondering when they were coming to find me and try to get me to come with them.” He said as he was leaning against her neck while sitting on her shoulder

She ate the rest of the meat as they were heading to her cave and his new home. He felt at peace laying his head, neck and back to the side of her neck; but he was thinking if he had any parents that loved him. She was watching where she was going and looking at him to check on him after awhile.

~I wonder if he knows about his real parents are not his foster parents, but a different pair.~ she thought before seeing that her cave is within range

It took some time for them to get to the cave, but it was long since she was in her giant form. She looked at him and he was sleeping against her neck. She smiled before walking into her cave and walked to the bed so she could put him on the hand-made pillow. She returned to normal sized and teleporting to him so she could least make him feel comfortable. She took off his shoes and shirt before placing them on the bedside table and look through his pack for any clothes that he could sleep in, but she couldn’t find anything in his pack.

~Looks like he was wearing the only set of clothes that he has on and they look like they need to be clean and patched up.~ she thought

~He looks like he needs a bath.~ she thought as she grew back to her giant form who picked him up with his shoes and shirt brought his body over to a waterfall basin with a small island in it

She put him on the island before taking the rest of his clothes off and put them on the grass. She kindly smiled before teleporting to get things to clean him with like soap, shampoo, and some other things.

~I have to get him some clothes to sleep in.~ ren thought as she returned to her normal form and started to wash him so he can be clean

She washed his hair first to get the dirt out and cleaned his hair in the waterfall before washing his body and inspecting for injuries. During her inspection, she noticed some muscle on him that was well toned and calyces on his hands from doing hard work. She looked at his back and noticed there were some old scars that healed, but this has gotten her curious to what made him get the scars on his back. She placed her paw on his back and closed her eyes; a faint glow around the scars appeared and they vanished before she open her eyes. Soon she got back to cleaning him and she was done before picking him up to dry him in a towel that is soft like her fur and like the same color.

“Thank you for taking my old pain away.” Ryan said in his sleep and she was just surprised

“Were you asleep while I was cleaning you up?” she asked him and he smiled

“A little, but I felt the pain of the scars being taken away and I thought it was something that one of my old friends said.” Ryan said as he opened his eyes to see her drying him off in a towel

“You will be wearing this towel until I can get your clothes clean and patched up.” She said and he smiled

“Did you look everywhere in my pack?” he asked and she nodded, but he shook his head

“I have another set of clothes and it’s in the pack.” He said

She brought him his pack and he pulled out a set of pajamas and a shirt to sleep in with some other clothes to wear.

“Where were they?” she asked him

“In plain sight.” He said with a small smile

She finished with the towel and put him on the bed before growing to a quarter of her giant form to get started on cleaning and patching up his other set of clothes while he is getting ready to sleep, but she has some place special for him to sleep.

~Someone that cares for you takes the pain away.~ ryan thought

~Maybe he is my son and kain is the father, but I don’t know how that could be.~ ren thought

Soon ren was done with the patch work on his clothes and went to put his clothes close to the basin where she cleaned him so his clothes can be clean. She grew to her giant form and picked him up before laying on the bed ready to sleep for the night.

“I have a good place for you to sleep.” She said as she lowered him to her chest and drop him a few feet from the ground. She placed him between her breasts and he was blushing as she was making sure that he was safe there.

“Why did you put me here?” he asked

“To make sure that I know that you are safe and you can sleep well in there.” She said and he still had a faint blush before he laid down

He heard her heartbeat since he was close to her heart and he started to fall asleep and ren did the same after making sure that he is safe. He did feel safe around her and he is having a dream about her and kain with ash, but something is happening ren and ash were hugging him as kain was showing him his armored beast form.

~”Both of you should be proud of him.”~ ash said as kain and ren blushed, but they nodded with a smile

~”I wonder what he has from me.”~ ren said as she looked at ryan’s young form in her hands

~”I’m glad that salen agreed to watch over him if anything were to happen to us.”~ kain said

~”I’m his aunt or his second mother since kain and I are like brother and sister or he loves me like he loves you.”~ ash said as kain looked away before returning to his human form

Young ryan started to move in his mother’s arms before opening his eyes for her to see her ice blue eye looking back at her. Soon he started to see some other things related to them, but he is happy to be sleeping with his giant mother and he started to cry in his sleep.
12111.title: Ren has an idea

121111.content:
Ryan is crying tears of joy and he started to rub is head into her fur. She felt something wet on her fur and it was close where ryan is sleeping. She felt him rubbing his head into her fur and she is about half-awake right now.

~Why is my fur wet where ryan is?~ she thought

Her mind shocked itself making her aware and she started to use her left index finger to stroke his back.

“Whatever it is, ryan it will be okay.” She said softly and he calmed down as some of the tears stopped

“Thank you for finding me, mom.” He said and she freezed up from hearing that

~How did he know that?!~ she thought surprised at the turn of events

“How do you know that I’m your mother?” she asked

“I had a dream with you, kain, and ash. I saw a younger me in your arms.” He said and he wiped the tears away before she could see him crying

~So that is how he knows.~ she thought and she smiled

“You can stop crying; everything will be okay.” She said and she gives him a gentle hug

She started to shrink down to half of her giant form to better the hug and see his face.

“Do you want to know why I like to be in my giant form?” she asked and he nodded

“Because I like to wrap myself around you so I know you are safe.” She said and he smiled

She saw his ice blue eyes and she smiled before hugging him tightly to her body and swinging him around with her body.

“Mom, you can let go now.” He said and she did with blush

“I’m just happy to have my son with me.” She said

“Where is kain or dad?” he asked

“I don’t know, but I think I know a few people who might know.” She said thinking of her friends

“How are we going to get into town without raising any flags?” ryan asked
121111.title: The next morning

1211111.content:
“I don’t know, but I think I know a few people who might know.” She said thinking of her friends

“How are we going to get into town without raising any flags?” ryan asked

“I can use my human form and we can act like mother and son, but I don’t know about how to keep the attention away from you.” She said

She put him on the floor of the cave before shrinking down to her normal height and she changed to her human form, but she grew to 7 feet, her hair is long strawberry blonde, has a full body tan, wearing camping clothes and shoes, ocean blue eyes with a reflective effect to them; and normal human ears.

“Wow.” Ryan said looking at her

“You got most of your looks from your father, but maybe it would be better for me to go alone into town and see if one of my old friends can help getting some information on kain.” She said and he thought about it

“That leader maybe trying to trap you if you come into town.” She said and he nodded

“Alright, I’ll stay here and you can go see salen about dad and ash.” He said
1211111.title: She has a plan

12111111.content:
While ryan is exploring his new home, his real mother, ren, is walking through the forest avoiding the cameras and walking to town to see her old friend salen who is a good friend to her, ryan, ash, and finally kain. Seeing her again and knowing that she will help her find the missing father and aunt, but why are these people after her son.

~It may lies with his foster parents and the fact that he may have been trying to find his real parents.~ she thought while remaining undetected

“They might have been raising him for his real parents and keeping them in the loop without him knowing.” She said to herself

She is making a map of the cameras so they can be destroyed later when ryan is with her.

Soon Ren made her journey through the forest and into the town where ryan, ashley, and kain used to live. Looking around, she headed straight for the bar that selma was working as the boss and went inside.

'Seems like nothing changed since kain left.' Ren thought as she took a seat at the bar.

“Haven't seen you here in a while, Ren. You need something?” A voice said as ren knew it was the person she was looking for to begin with.

“Some ears on the ground because a boy walked into the forest. Still missing a former berserker beast and an old friend.” Ren said and the person nodded.

“You need anything else?”

“An eye on people who are trying to harm the boy or 'rescue' him.” She added.

“Ok. You need any food for the road?” was asked.

“Have it ready for the night. Don't need any tails for right now.” Ren said before leaving the bar and then the town. She has some planning to do before she has to be back to pick up ryan's food.

From the time she made it back to the cave, she and ryan were spending time finding cameras and destorying them without being seen. They were making a contest out of it. Soon it was time for her to get his food and she left him at the cave again.
12111111.title: Into town

choices: Ryan and Alice goes find the yellow fox
Ryan and alice gets to know each other
a stranger comes to them and ryan feels something from them
Ryan goes back into the forest like something is leading him with his sister
15.content:
Ryan was tired of feeling sorry for himself, so he decided to leave the forest and find somewhere else to stay. He packed up his things and started walking down the dirt path that would lead him out. He hadn't even reach the end of the forest when he heard the bushes rustling. He turned to look and saw a pair of eyes that spooked him so he started to run.

On the other side of the forest was a young girl in her early teens. She too had seen something hiding in the bushes so she ran as well. They were both looking behind them when *BAM!* they ran into each other. They both spun around to look at each other. Each one had a look of surprise on their faces. Ryan quickly picked himself up and helped her up as well. "Hi, I'm Ryan Morgan, and you are?"
"Alice Morgan. Hey, I think I know you. Didn't your parents get divorced?"
"Yeah, I couldn't stand their constant fighting over me any more, so I left," he replied.
"Were their names, um, let me see here...Oh yeah, Tracy and Michael?" she asked.
"Yeah, why?" he replied.
"They're my parents too, so that would make us like siblings," she said.
"Well I never thought I had a sister, but I guess that makes two of us," he said.

Ryan decided to stop moping around in the forest and went back home with his sister. His parents never regained custody of either of them, so they found a way to live on their own.
15.title: The boy leaves

info.brief_description: My version is like the other two, but this person will be different from the others
info.description:
This story will be different from the other two.

In this story, a boy named Ryan is in the same forest as a certain giant fox and he is looking for her. He is quite young like 10 years old, short brown hair and black eyes, has mini muscles from living on his own in the forest, and has something special about him.

I give credit to Skye (skripte) and his interactive story, "Invalid Item" .
Also to Kain and his story version "Invalid Item" .
I use their character's names as a reference.

Let the story begin.
info.pretty_title: Captured by a giant renamon (my version)
